item.thaumometer.name: Thaumometer
actionText.subtitle.aspects_not_valid0: §5§oTo understand this you need study something else.
actionText.subtitle.aspects_not_valid1: §5§oYour efforts are commendable, but the aspects remain elusive.
actionText.subtitle.aspects_not_valid2: §5§oThe mystical aspects remain hidden from your senses.
actionText.subtitle.unknown_object: §5§oNothing new can be learned from this
actionText.subtitle.inv_too_large: §5§oInventory too large. Only scanning first 100 items.
actionText.subtitle.clue_research_fail: §5§oYou discovered a clue, but it is lost since you can't record it!
